group_1.textLeft: I never want to miss the perfect picture.

group_1.narration: I became a Magical Girl, but that@didn't mean my life changed@drastically overnight or anything.

group_1.textCenter: (I guess I'm a Magical Girl now? It sure@doesn't feel like it.)
(I haven't really been able to test whether@my wish was granted or not...)
(The sunset is so pretty today. I should@take a shot of it...)
(The repair shop over there looks perfect in@this light, so I guess I'll take one more.)

group_1.textRight: Did you print your photos, Ryo? That sunset@was gorgeous, wasn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I just printed them out... But our@printer doesn't really do it justice.

group_1.textRight: Oh no! All the colors are blurred together.

group_1.textLeft: Want to see the raw photo?

group_1.textRight: Yes, please! Oooh, you're good at this.

group_1.textLeft: This one also looks great. See? The light@reflecting off the repair shop wall is nice.

group_1.textRight: I think they were talking about tearing that@place down. The car shop, right?
It does seem pretty dire. Look, there's@only one car parked there.
It's a tough world out there!

group_1.textLeft: That wasn't what I wanted you to look at,@but...

group_1.textRight: Huh? Hey, now. Doesn't that car look odd?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? [chara:304601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304601:cheek_0][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]Oh, wait! This is the car!

group_1.narration: The car that drove away from that@hit-and-run... There it was, in my photo.
There was no doubt about it.@It even had an unnatural dent in its side.

group_1.textLeft: Where's that business card? Right, I put it@in my drawer!
This car! It's the one from the hit-and-run!

group_1.narration: After I alerted the authorities...@My photo was used to identify@and arrest the hit-and-run driver.

group_1.textLeft: You did so much to help me, young lady!@You even testified for me.

group_1.textRight: N-no, it wasn't... [chara:304601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:304601:motion_0][chara:304601:cheek_2][chara:304601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:304601:lipSynch_1]I was just doing what@anyone would do.
(I took the perfect shot. I didn't miss it!)

group_1.narration: Unfortunately...@My glee at having my wish@granted didn't last for very long.
